verses.verse: Now the leaders <WH8269> of the people <WH5971> lived <WH3427> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> but the rest <WH7605> of the people <WH5971> cast <WH5307> lots <WH1486> to bring <WH935> one <WH259> out of ten <WH6235> to live <WH3427> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> the holy <WH6944> city, <WH5892> while nine-tenths [remained] in the [other] cities. <WH5892>
And the people <WH5971> blessed <WH1288> all <WH3605> the men <WH376> who volunteered <WH5068> to live <WH3427> in Jerusalem. <WH3389>

Now these <WH428> are the heads <WH7218> of the provinces <WH4082> who <WH834> lived <WH3427> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> but in the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> each <WH376> lived <WH3427> on his own property <WH272> in their cities <WH5892> â€“ the Israelites, <WH3478> the priests, <WH3548> the Levites, <WH3881> the temple <WH5411> servants <WH5411> and the descendants <WH1121> of Solomon's servants. <WH5650>

And some <WH4480> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> and some <WH4480> of the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> lived <WH3427> in Jerusalem. <WH3389> From the sons <WH1121> of Judah: <WH3063> Athaiah <WH6265> the son <WH1121> of Uzziah, <WH5818> the son <WH1121> of Zechariah, <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Amariah, <WH568> the son <WH1121> of Shephatiah, <WH8203> the son <WH1121> of Mahalalel, <WH4111> of the sons <WH1121> of Perez; <WH6557>

and Maaseiah <WH4641> the son <WH1121> of Baruch, <WH1263> the son <WH1121> of Col-hozeh, the son <WH1121> of Hazaiah, <WH2382> the son <WH1121> of Adaiah, <WH5718> the son <WH1121> of Joiarib, <WH3080> the son <WH1121> of Zechariah, <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of the Shilonite. <WH7888>
All <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of Perez <WH6557> who lived <WH3427> in Jerusalem <WH3389> were 468 able <WH2428> men. <WH376>

Now these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin: <WH1144> Sallu <WH9365> the son <WH1121> of Meshullam, <WH4918> the son <WH1121> of Joed, <WH3133> the son <WH1121> of Pedaiah, <WH6305> the son <WH1121> of Kolaiah, <WH6964> the son <WH1121> of Maaseiah, <WH4641> the son <WH1121> of Ithiel, <WH384> the son <WH1121> of Jeshaiah; <WH3470>
and after <WH310> him Gabbai <WH1373> [and] Sallai, <WH9367> 928.

And Joel <WH3100> the son <WH1121> of Zichri <WH2147> was their overseer, <WH6496> and Judah <WH3063> the son <WH1121> of Hassenuah <WH5574> was second <WH4932> in command <WH5921> of the city. <WH5892>
From the priests: <WH3548> Jedaiah <WH3048> the son <WH1121> of Joiarib, <WH3080> Jachin, <WH3199>

Seraiah <WH8304> the son <WH1121> of Hilkiah, <WH2518> the son <WH1121> of Meshullam, <WH4918> the son <WH1121> of Zadok, <WH6659> the son <WH1121> of Meraioth, <WH4812> the son <WH1121> of Ahitub, <WH285> the leader <WH5057> of the house <WH1004> of God, <WH430>

and their kinsmen <WH251> who performed <WH6213> the work <WH4399> of the temple, <WH1004> 822; and Adaiah <WH5718> the son <WH1121> of Jeroham, <WH3395> the son <WH1121> of Pelaliah, <WH6421> the son <WH1121> of Amzi, <WH557> the son <WH1121> of Zechariah, <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Pashhur, <WH6583> the son <WH1121> of Malchijah, <WH4441>

and his kinsmen, <WH251> heads <WH7218> of fathers' [households,]; <WH242> and Amashsai <WH6023> the son <WH1121> of Azarel, <WH5832> the son <WH1121> of Ahzai, <WH273> the son <WH1121> of Meshillemoth, <WH4919> the son <WH1121> of Immer, <WH564>
and their brothers, <WH251> valiant <WH2428> warriors, <WH1368> 128. And their overseer <WH6496> was Zabdiel, <WH2068> the son <WH1121> of Haggedolim. <WH9092>

Now from the Levites: <WH3881> Shemaiah <WH8098> the son <WH1121> of Hasshub, <WH2815> the son <WH1121> of Azrikam, <WH5840> the son <WH1121> of Hashabiah, <WH2811> the son <WH1121> of Bunni; <WH1138>

and Shabbethai <WH7678> and Jozabad, <WH3107> from the leaders <WH7218> of the Levites, <WH3881> who were in charge <WH5921> of the outside <WH2435> work <WH4399> of the house <WH1004> of God; <WH430>

and Mattaniah <WH4983> the son <WH1121> of Mica, <WH4316> the son <WH1121> of Zabdi, <WH2067> the son <WH1121> of Asaph, <WH623> who was the leader <WH7218> in beginning <WH8462> the thanksgiving <WH3034> at prayer, <WH8605> and Bakbukiah, <WH1229> the second <WH4932> among <WH4480> his brethren; <WH251> and Abda <WH5653> the son <WH1121> of Shammua, <WH8051> the son <WH1121> of Galal, <WH1559> the son <WH1121> of Jeduthun. <WH3038>
All <WH3605> the Levites <WH3881> in the holy <WH6944> city <WH5892> [were] 284.
Also the gatekeepers, <WH7778> Akkub, <WH6126> Talmon, <WH2929> and their brethren, <WH251> who kept <WH8104> watch <WH8104> at the gates, <WH8179> [were] 172.

And the rest <WH7605> of Israel, <WH3478> of the priests, <WH3548> [and] of the Levites, <WH3881> [were] in all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of Judah, <WH3063> each <WH376> on his own inheritance. <WH5159>
But the temple <WH5411> servants <WH5411> were living <WH3427> in Ophel, <WH6077> and Ziha <WH6727> and Gishpa <WH1658> were in charge <WH5921> of the temple <WH5411> servants. <WH5411>

Now the overseer <WH6496> of the Levites <WH3881> in Jerusalem <WH3389> was Uzzi <WH5813> the son <WH1121> of Bani, <WH1137> the son <WH1121> of Hashabiah, <WH2811> the son <WH1121> of Mattaniah, <WH4983> the son <WH1121> of Mica, <WH4316> from the sons <WH1121> of Asaph, <WH623> who were the singers <WH7891> for the service <WH4399> of the house <WH1004> of God. <WH430>
For [there was] a commandment <WH4687> from the king <WH4428> concerning <WH5921> them and a firm <WH548> regulation <WH548> for the song <WH7891> leaders <WH7891> day <WH3117> by day. <WH3117>

And Pethahiah <WH6611> the son <WH1121> of Meshezabel, <WH4898> of the sons <WH1121> of Zerah <WH2226> the son <WH1121> of Judah, <WH3063> was the king's representative <WH3027> in all <WH3605> matters <WH1697> concerning the people. <WH5971>

Now as for the villages <WH9161> with their fields, <WH7704> some <WH4480> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> lived <WH3427> in Kiriath-arba and its towns, <WH1323> in Dibon <WH1769> and its towns, <WH1323> and in Jekabzeel <WH6909> and its villages, <WH9161>
and in Jeshua, <WH3091> in Moladah <WH4137> and Beth-pelet,
and in Hazar-shual, in Beersheba <WH884> and its towns, <WH1323>
and in Ziklag, <WH6860> in Meconah <WH4368> and in its towns, <WH1323>
and in En-rimmon, in Zorah <WH6881> and in Jarmuth, <WH3412>

Zanoah, <WH2182> Adullam, <WH5725> and their villages, <WH9161> Lachish <WH3923> and its fields, <WH7704> Azekah <WH5825> and its towns. <WH1323> So they encamped <WH2583> from Beersheba <WH884> as far <WH5704> as the valley <WH1516> of Hinnom. <WH2011>
The sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> also [lived] from Geba <WH1387> [onward,] at Michmash <WH4363> and Aija, <WH5857> at Bethel <WH1008> and its towns, <WH1323>
at Anathoth, <WH6068> Nob, <WH5011> Ananiah, <WH6055>
Hazor, <WH2674> Ramah, <WH7414> Gittaim, <WH1664>
Hadid, <WH2307> Zeboim, <WH6650> Neballat, <WH5041>
Lod <WH3850> and Ono, <WH207> the valley <WH1516> of craftsmen. <WH2796>
And from the Levites, <WH3881> [some] divisions <WH4256> in Judah <WH3063> belonged to Benjamin. <WH1144>
